channel.title: Aristocrat[Name subject to change] (Cult Something)
channel.description:
Day Ability 1: Undecided
Night Ability 1: Undecided
Passive: Royal Blood
Lore: Who the heck knows?
Comments: There should be a Cultist with Royal Blood, because in a Blue Dragon vs Cult game, Royals that step up have a 100% chance to be Blue Dragon Converted Royals become this class and not the Cult Class corresponding to their Class Type
## Use this thread to suggest ideas as I don't have any currently
